creator: danderson_75@yahoo.com
text:
The Regular Expression Extractor defaults back to the Body choice when 
refreshing it's view.

Setup: 
1. In the GUI,and I have an http request with a Regular Expression Extractor 
attached to it. 
2. In the Regular Expression Extractor choose the Header choice.
3. View another element in the testcase. (i.e. view the http request).
4. View the Regular Expression Extractor.

Expected Result: 
The Header should be selected.

Actual Result:
The Body is selected.

Note: The test will work as expected when ran. Also when saved the test will be 
saved correctly until the Regular Expression Extractor is viewed again.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2983 ***

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
